properties.name: acronym
properties.label: acronym
properties.documentation: This property is of the datatype Text and it is being used to provide the '''acronym''' of an academic  event series.It is a recommended property when describing an academic event or event series and it is not needed for the DOI registration process via DataCite.

properties.name: gndId
properties.label: GND ID
properties.documentation:
This property  of the datatype External identifier is used to provide the identifier with which an entity is indexed in the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Integrated_Authority_File Integrated_Authority_File (GND)]. Its external formatter URI is http://d-nb.info/gnd/$1.
In Open Research it is mostly used to identify an academic event or event series within the GND. 
The use of this property is optional.
It is not necessary for the DOI registration process via DataCite.

properties.name: subject
properties.label: academic field/subject
properties.documentation:
The '''academic field''' property is used to denote the research area of an academic event or event series. The allowed values of this property should be derived from a controlled vocabulary such as the OECD or DFG classification scheme.
Although this property is not needed for the DOI registration process via DataCite its usage is strongly recommended.

properties.name: Homepage
properties.label: official website
properties.documentation:
This property is of the datatype URL and it is being used to provide the '''official website''' of an academic event or an event series.
It is a recommended property when describing an academic event or event series and it is not needed for the DOI registration process via DataCite.

properties.name: sponsor
properties.label: sponsor
properties.documentation:
This property  of the datatype Page is used to specify the organization or person that sponsors or funds an academic event or event series. 
The use of this property is recommended. It is not necessary for the DOI registration process via DataCite.

properties.name: name
properties.label: official name
properties.documentation:
This property  is of the datatype Text and it is being used to specify the '''official name''' of an academic event or event series. 
It is a mandatory property when describing an academic event or event series and it is needed for the DOI registration process via DataCite.

properties.name: WikiCfpSeries
properties.label: WikiCFP Series
properties.documentation:
This property  of the datatype External identifier is used to provide the identifier with which an entity is indexed in [http://www.wikicfp.com WikiCFP]. Its external formatter URI is http://www.wikicfp.com/cfp/servlet/event.showcfp?eventid=$1.
In Open Research it is used to identify an academic event or event series within WikiCFP. 
The use of this property is optional. It is not necessary for the DOI registration process via DataCite.

properties.name: wikidataId
properties.label: wikidata QID
properties.documentation:
This property  of the datatype External identifier is used to provide the identifier with which an entity is indexed in [https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Wikidata:Main_Page Wikidata]. Its external formatter URI is https://www.wikidata.org/entity/$1.
In Open Research it is mostly used to identify an academic event or event series within Wikidata. 
The use of this property is optional. It is not necessary for the DOI registration process via DataCite.

properties.name: DblpSeries
properties.label: dblp Series
properties.documentation:
This [[isA::Property|property ]] of the datatype [[Has type::External identifier]] is used to map an dblp series name to the dblp page 

It's external formatter URI is [[External formatter uri::https://dblp.org/db/conf/$1/index.html]].
